thread.title_full: Buyatab wins Best Digital Gifting Programme at Emerging Payments Awards

author: Maddie Holeksa
title: Buyatab wins Best Digital Gifting Programme at Emerging Payments Awards
text:
Vancouver, British Columbia: Buyatab Online, a leader in digital gifting, is thrilled to announce that it won the award for Best Digital Gifting Programme at the 8th Annual Emerging Payments Awards, in London, England on October 15, 2015. Buyatab received the top honor of Best Digital Gifting Programme in recognition of its Tim Hortons digital and mobile gifting program.
“We are honored to be recognized for the digital gifting solution we developed for Tim Hortons. In particular, our integration with their Timmy-ME mobile app really turned heads.” said Matias Marquez, Founder and COO, adding, “Our solution and design flexibility allows our merchant partners to gain a competitive edge in digital gifting, and leverage the rapid growth in mobile device usage and social media.”
The Emerging Payments Awards celebrate the entrepreneurialism and creative talent involved in the global and constantly evolving market of payments technology. Entries, from around the globe in 20+ categories, are judged by a team of independent industry experts. A short list of finalists is produced and the winners announced at the ceremony in London, England.
About Buyatab
Buyatab Online is a leading provider of advanced eGift card infrastructure solutions for medium and large-sized businesses. Buyatab provides a seamless solution for eGift cards to be purchased from a merchant's online properties (website, mobile site, Facebook page etc.) and delivered to recipients via email or text message, leveraging the rapid growth in mobile device and social media usage and with full compatibility to mobile wallets like Apple's Passbook. With clients in the United States, Canada and Asia, Buyatab provides eGift card services to merchants in a wide variety of sectors including retail, hospitality, restaurant, shopping, hotels and others.
